SearchDropdown.description: This component provides a search dropdown for articles.

handleChange.description: Handles the change event for the search input.

handleKeyDown.description: Handles keydown events for the search input, enabling arrow key navigation and Enter key selection.

handleResultClick.description: Handles the click event for a search result, navigating to the article page.

handleClickOutside.description: Handles clicks outside the search dropdown to close it.

handleSubmit.description: Handles the form submission, navigating to a search results page.

highlightMatch.description: Highlights the matched search term within a text string.

getHighlightedSnippet.description: Generates a highlighted snippet of the article content, showing the search term in context.
